name: douyin-toolbox
description: A cross-platform app for parsing Douyin links, getting watermark-free video URLs, and extracting video text using AI

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mcp"
scripts.dev:backend:stt: export DASHSCOPE_API_KEY=$(cat .env 2>/dev/null | grep DASHSCOPE_API_KEY | cut -d'=' -f2) && cd backend && node src/app.js
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:stt: export DASHSCOPE_API_KEY=$(cat .env 2>/dev/null | grep DASHSCOPE_API_KEY | cut -d'=' -f2) && cd backend && node src/app.js
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.status: echo 'Checking services...' && lsof -i :3000 2>/dev/null | grep LISTEN && echo 'Backend: Running on http://localhost:3000' || echo 'Backend: Stopped' && lsof -i :8080 2>/dev/null | grep LISTEN && echo 'Frontend: Running on http://localhost:8080' || echo 'Frontend: Stopped' && lsof -i :8000 2>/dev/null | grep LISTEN && echo 'MCP: Running on http://localhost:8000' || echo 'MCP: Stopped'

author: Douyin Toolbox
